import React from "react" import { ListGroup } from "reactstrap" import CartItem from "./CartItem" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import "../../styles/shopping-cart.css" import { uiActions } from "../../store/ui-slice" import { useDispatch } from "react-redux" const Cart = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const toggleCartHandler = () => { dispatch(uiActions.toggle()) } return (
{cartProducts.length === 0 ? (

) : ( cartProducts.map((item, index) => ( )) )}

) } export default Cart
